articles.title: James Van Der Beek’s best performances streaming now

summary: Stream James Van Der Beek's top performances this weekend in Boston.

articles.title: Obama took on recession, health care and Iraq. What he didn’t see coming was Trump.
articles.description:
“The outcome of the election was a direct rebuke of everything that we had been trying to do for the last 10 years,” reflected Josh Earnest, who was Obama’s last White House press secretary.

The post Obama took on recession, health care and Iraq. What he didn’t see coming was Trump. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Josh Earnest reflects on the 2016 election's impact on Boston's political landscape.
Obama's policies faced backlash, influencing local voter sentiment in Massachusetts.
The election results shifted Boston's political dynamics, affecting future governance and policy.

articles.title: A Love Letters phone booth is at the Boston Public Library
articles.description:
The new “Tell-A-Booth” lets you pick up the phone and leave an anonymous question or message for the column.

The post A Love Letters phone booth is at the Boston Public Library appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston Public Library introduces 'Tell-A-Booth' for anonymous messages on February 18, 2026.
Residents can leave questions or messages, fostering community engagement and connection.
The initiative enhances the library's role as a hub for local communication.

articles.title: If Boston had its own ‘Winter Olympics,’ what would the events be?
articles.description:
A Reddit thread imagined Boston "Winter Olympic" events, from “Spot Saver Curling” to “Storrow Drive Limbo.” Tell us your best ideas.

summary: Boston residents suggested unique events like 'Spot Saver Curling' in a Reddit thread.
Creative ideas include 'Storrow Drive Limbo' to reflect local culture and challenges.
Engagement in the thread highlights community creativity and pride in Boston's winter lifestyle.

articles.title: Jaylen Brown has conversation with Dana White as he toys with idea of future career in UFC after NBA
articles.description:

summary: Jaylen Brown discusses potential UFC career after NBA with Dana White.
Brown mentioned interest in boxing or UFC post-NBA during recent comments.
Boston Celtics fans may see a shift in Brown's focus in future sports.

articles.title: Mass. man faces slew of charges after allegedly driving drunk with kids in car
articles.description:
A Worcester man was arrested by Southborough police and now faces charges of driving under the influence, driving without a license, and child endangerment, police say.

The post Mass. man faces slew of charges after allegedly driving drunk with kids in car appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Worcester man arrested for DUI and child endangerment in Southborough.
Charges include driving without a license and endangering minors.
Incident raises concerns about child safety in local communities.

articles.title: A father in Shirley built a 20-foot snowman for his daughter
articles.description:
"Parker" the snowman has become a neighborhood photo stop — and next winter, it could get even bigger.

summary: A father in Shirley built a 20-foot snowman named Parker for his daughter.
Parker has become a popular photo stop for local residents and visitors.
Next winter, the snowman could be even larger, enhancing community engagement.

articles.title: Loose dog makes Olympic cameo on the cross-country ski course at the Milan Cortina Games
articles.description:
The dog had slipped away from a local owner while out on a nearby walk, officials later said.

The post Loose dog makes Olympic cameo on the cross-country ski course at the Milan Cortina Games appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: A loose dog interrupted the cross-country ski course at the Milan Cortina Games.

Boston residents may consider stricter leash laws to prevent similar incidents.
